response.original_title: La escuelita, historias del terrorismo de estado en Bahía Blanca
response.overview: The holding of trials for crimes against humanity in the city is a historic event that, at the same time, hasn't received the coverage it deserves in some media outlets. "La Escuelita" documents a crucial moment in the history of the people of Bahía Blanca, but at the same time, outside of the "small town," it represents an opportunity to raise awareness of the difficulties that "Memory, Truth, and Justice" must grapple with when it comes to raising these issues outside of major urban centers.
response.title: The Little School: Stories of State Terrorism in Bahía Blanca
